bioconda.name: bioconductor-yapsa
bioconda.summary: Yet Another Package for Signature Analysis

biotools.summary: This package provides functions and routines useful in the analysis of somatic signatures. In particular, functions to perform a signature analysis with known signatures (LCD = linear combination decomposition) and a signature analysis on stratified mutational catalogue (SMC = stratify mutational catalogue) are provided.

bioschemas.name: YAPSA
bioschemas.summary: This package provides functions and routines useful in the analysis of somatic signatures. In particular, functions to perform a signature analysis with known signatures (LCD = linear combination decomposition) and a signature analysis on stratified mutational catalogue (SMC = stratify mutational catalogue) are provided.
